turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, Carlos. I need a coffee asap.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, sir. Where from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get it from the Starbucks in Parkchester.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that the one by Metropolitan Circle?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I think so.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get me a Iced Peppermint White Chocolate Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande. And I want it with whole milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, no problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And make sure they don't forget the whipping cream. Last time they forgot it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. I'll make sure they won't.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want me to read back your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so I'm ordering a Grande Iced Peppermint White Chocolate Mocha with whole milk and whipping cream from the Starbucks at Parkchester.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right, the order is placed. It'll be ready for pick up shortly. I'm sending your receipt via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, Carlos. Bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, sir. Bye.
